casebody.data:
No. 09-11519 (10A1020). Gayland Bradford, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 563 U.S. 1018, 131 S. Ct. 2929,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1268,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4020. May 27, 2011.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to Justice Scalia, and by him referred to the Court, denied. Motion for leave to file petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 1177, 131 S. Ct. 993, 178 L. Ed. 2d 825, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 710.
